definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Which nail remover is gentle for my nails?
sentences.chinese: 哪种洗甲水不会损伤指甲？

sentences.english: Never apply to lips or eyes.
sentences.chinese: 注意不要把洗甲水弄到嘴里和眼睛里。

sentences.english: Wet a rag with a solvent such as nail polish remover and rub away stains.
sentences.chinese: 用洗甲水将破布弄湿，而后将污点除去。

sentences.english: Is it important to choose the right nail polish remover?
sentences.chinese: 选择得当的洗甲水重要吗？

sentences.english: Will use, Ms. A used washing water can be wiped clean.
sentences.chinese: 将使用女士，用洗甲水可以擦干净。

definition: essential balm containing menthol, eucalyptus oil etc, used as a mosquito repellant
